known_issues: Chat section can get stuck in one place / scrolling not smooth

existing_features.title: Fix the chat transcript area so it scrolls smoothly and never appears “stuck in one place” on the /chat page, including ensuring the transcript region reliably becomes scrollable within the available viewport height.

Make auto-scroll-to-bottom behavior reliable when new chat messages are added, using a scroll target that actually controls the scrollable viewport (avoid attaching scroll logic to a non-scrollable wrapper), without modifying any files under frontend/src/components/ui.

new_feature_requests.summary: Fix chat section UI so it scrolls/runs smoothly and no longer sticks in one place

projectName: Fix chat transcript scrolling so it no longer sticks and feels smooth
